Articles.Content:
Hi all...just a quickie.....ive now got V 1.0 and its great, however it did knock out my game saves. That aside, I have 4 mods I typically use....mechjeb, chatterer, kw rocketry and planetshIne.

2 mods, mechjeb and chatterer work fine, however the other 2 dont work? Is this just because the mod creators havnt updated yet or will they be gone for good?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T21:59:50Z" title="04/28/2015 09:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by maceemiller**

1.0 came out yesterday... 

It takes time to update the larger mods.
